title: Advanced typography and design and illustration design.
description: Master the essentials of HTML5, including semantic markup, forms, and multimedia integration.

title: RESTful API Development with Express
description: Master the concepts of building RESTful APIs using Express.js and create robust backend services for web applications.

title: Complete Web Design from Figma to Webflow to Freelancing
description: 3 in 1 Course: Learn to design websites with Figma, build with Webflow, and make a living freelancing.

title: Data Visualization with Tableau
description: Explore the power of data visualization using Tableau and create compelling visual representations of data.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Create responsive and mobile-friendly websites using media queries and flexible layouts.

title: Data Analysis with SQL
description: Master SQL queries and use them to perform data analysis tasks on relational databases.

title: Frontend Frameworks: Vue.js
description: Discover Vue.js, a progressive JavaScript framework for building scalable and interactive web applications.

title: User Research and Analysis
description: Explore techniques for conducting user research and analyze data to inform and improve product design decisions.

title: Web Accessibility
description: Learn how to create inclusive and accessible web experiences, covering WCAG guidelines and assistive technologies.

title: Frontend Performance Optimization
description: Optimize website performance through techniques like minification, caching, and image optimization.

title: Authentication and Authorization
description: Explore different authentication and authorization techniques to secure backend APIs and protect user data.

title: JavaScript for Frontend Development
description: Unlock the power of JavaScript and learn to create interactive and dynamic web applications.
